title: Good job Riot.
body: Lovely. How can i not hate this game? Getting 2 weeks ban right before season ends after like 3 months of clean behaviour. But hey. What do i know. I bet the silver 1 suport who picked Ashe as suport didn't get any punishment. I bet the Master tier shaco who went 0/10 and said he is #3 world shaco didn't get any punishment. I bet the enemy diamond MF who spammed easy all game while being fed by our 0/10 syndra didn't get any punishment. Try to carry games, try to do something in the vast sea of retards, get banned. Im done. If im getting 2 weeks ban for flaming they should be perma banned for feeding and trolling so i don't have to deal with at least one retard ever game.

replies.body: Am I the only one who comes to this board to get a kick out of toxic players being punished and then whining about it? Feedback on reports is so rare it often feels like they do nothing, but then I come here and am reminded that the system does work.

I always hope I see one of the people I reported posting here. I haven't yet, but it would be so satisfying. "Go ahead and report me, idc, I always do this and never get banned." 

That's what they all say before coming here.
You can try to carry your games and not be a horrible person to be around at the same time.

on the positive side

people won't have to deal with you for two weeks   :^)
And No season rewards :D
Deal with what? Me carrying them?
I think Wolfess was alluding to you calling people "retards." That kind of behavior isn't acceptable.

Well, thats how it is....

0/15 "LOLOL just a bad game everybody has bad games!"

To the 0/15 guy - "Dude, you're bad" - BANNED.

Why. Why it must be like this. Even that. When they were feeding they were blaming everyone except them. How can a decent ( far from good ) player like me get banned for trying. The amount of stupidity is just overwhelming to simply shut up.
Riot, and surprisingly most people on this forum, believe that chat is a bigger offense than trolling/feeding. I don't really understand it either, but thats just how it is.

They both are equal offenses but flaming is easyer to detect than trolling. People can have a bad game or be just straight up Bad at the game it's sometimes hard to differ from just the matchhistory. Flamers can easyly be detected from their chatlogs

> [{quoted}](name=The Big Piece,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0yyec3gZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-02T07:24:12.023+0000)
>
> Well, thats how it is....
> 
> 0/15 "LOLOL just a bad game everybody has bad games!"
> 
> To the 0/15 guy - "Dude, you're bad" - BANNED.

What purpose does telling someone they're bad serve? Seriously, think it over. If they are actually trolling, then you are just playing into their shit. If they are actually just a bad player having a bad game then what you are doing is kicking someone else when they are already down.

Thats not really the point I was making. The problem I have is that feeding legitimately ruins the game is not considered punishable and carries no consequences whatsoever. Yet Riot will quickly ban anyone who reacts to it. And I just can't agree that calling someone "bad" is banworthy.
Fair warning, if you got a two week ban then you need to on your best behavior because the next punishment is a permaban.
So much time wasted to get a plat border, didnt aim for diamond cause of no time and now i wont even receive it.

Good job Riot indeed

Yet again, rank is used as a form of autowinning an arguement. Use an actual strategy please. On another note, just don't get mad at players on your team who are feeding; as much as you want to. Being toxic to someone is still toxic to someone who's feeding.

Ashe can be support, she just shouldn't be taking all the kills. But you didn't say if she was, so you just don't seem to like someone for playing that champ. People can have bad games, though that Shaco is far from #3. Maybe MF did get punished. If you disrespect your teammates like this, you'll get punished, for good reason. You're the one being toxic here.

Flame is not lame sometimes you have to let the retards know that they are retarded but rito doesnt understand that when you get like 5 games in a row of straight up trolls and feeders you are tilted off the face of the planet and if you go into your next game with more trolls and feeders you may just go off on the retard causing you your suffering. Sorry man rito has been doing more and more stupid shit just look at season 7 changes LUL
Being toxic to someone with a decent score and someone feeding is still the same thing; it isn't justified just because someone is feeding.
